name: Free Shipping Notice for WooCommerce
author: Caitlin Chou

sections.description:
Increase average order value by advertising your free shipping. Make sure your customers know about your offer through the Free Shipping Notice plugin.

Free Shipping Notice adds a message in your cart and checkout about the amount remaining until a customer is eligible for free shipping.

Features
* Individualized – updates based on each customer’s cart total to show remaining amount to spend
* Customization – customize colors, free shipping minimum, and applicable countries in the settings tab
* Geolocation – the plugin will detect a customer’s country to see if free shipping applies there (based on settings)
* Mobile-friendly – compatible with mobile devices

Note
To use Free Shipping Notice, you must set up free shipping by adding a “free shipping” shipping method with a minimum order requirement through WooCommerce shipping zones
sections.installation:
1. Upload free-shipping-notice.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings -> Free Shipping Notice to customize the plugin
sections.faq:
How do I contact support for help or issues with the plugin?

Post in the support forum or email me at caitlinchou at gmail dot com.

Can I suggest a feature?

I would love to hear your input. Email me at caitlinchou at gmail dot com.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • currency formatted correctly
  • add options in settings to toggle message on cart and checkout

1.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Displays the remaining price to receive free shipping on the cart and checkout pages.
description:
Increase average order value by advertising your free shipping. Make sure your customers know about your offer through the Free Shipping Notice plugin.

Free Shipping Notice adds a message in your cart and checkout about the amount remaining until a customer is eligible for free shipping.

Features
* Individualized – updates based on each customer’s cart total to show remaining amount to spend
* Customization – customize colors, free shipping minimum, and applicable countries in the settings tab
* Geolocation – the plugin will detect a customer’s country to see if free shipping applies there (based on settings)
* Mobile-friendly – compatible with mobile devices

Note
To use Free Shipping Notice, you must set up free shipping by adding a “free shipping” shipping method with a minimum order requirement through WooCommerce shipping zones

screenshots.caption: On the cart page, customers will be alerted to see how much more they have to spend to reach free shipping if their current total is under the free shipping amount.
The checkout page also displays the free shipping notice.
In settings, you can change the minimum free shipping requirement, highlight color for the notice, and countries that free shipping applies to.
